flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: DUSCLOPS’s body is completely hollow -nthere is nothing at all inside.nIt is said that its body is like a blackfhole. This POKéMON will absorb anythingninto its body, but nothing will ever comenback out.

DUSCLOPS absorbs anything, howevernlarge the object may be. This POKéMONnhypnotizes its foe by waving its handsfin a macabre manner and by bringing itsnsingle eye to bear. The hypnotized foenis made to do DUSCLOPS’s bidding.
It is thought that its body is hollow withnonly a spectral ball of fire burning inside.nHowever, no one has been able tonconfirm this theory as fact.
Its body is entirely hollow. When it opensnits mouth, it sucks everything in as if itnwere a black hole.
Its body is entirely hollow. When it opensnits mouth, it sucks everything in as if itnwere a black hole.
Its body is hollow. It is said thatnthose who look into its body arensucked into the void.
Its body is hollow. It is said thatnthose who look into its body arensucked into the void.
It seeks drifting will-o’-the-wispsnand sucks them into its empty body.nWhat happens inside is a mystery.
Anyone who dares peer into its bodynto see its spectral ball of firenwill have their spirit stolen away.
Anyone who dares peer into its bodynto see its spectral ball of firenwill have their spirit stolen away.
Il cherche des feux follets pournles avaler. Ce qui se passe alorsndans son corps est un mystère.
It seeks drifting will-o’-the-wispsnand sucks them into its empty body.nWhat happens inside is a mystery.
Il cherche des feux follets pournles avaler. Ce qui se passe alorsndans son corps est un mystère.
It seeks drifting will-o’-the-wispsnand sucks them into its empty body.nWhat happens inside is a mystery.
It seeks drifting will-o’-the-wispsnand sucks them into its empty body.nWhat happens inside is a mystery.
It seeks drifting will-o’-the-wispsnand sucks them into its empty body.nWhat happens inside is a mystery.
からだの　なかで　もえているnひとだまを　のぞきこむとnたましいを　すいとられてしまう。
몸 안에서 불타고 있는n도깨비불을 들여다보면n영혼을 빼앗겨버린다.
Il aspire l’âme de ceux qui regardent dans son corpsncreux où rougeoie son unique œil.
Blickt man direkt in den Feuerball in seinemnInneren, wird einem die Seele ausgesaugt.
Si alguien mira los fuegos fatuos del interior denDusclops, perderá su alma irremediablemente.
Se si osserva troppo da vicino la palla di fuocondentro Dusclops, la propria anima viene risucchiata.
Anyone who dares peer into its body to see itsnspectral ball of fire will have their spirit stolen away.
体の　中で　燃えているn人魂を　のぞきこむとn魂を　吸い取られてしまう。
からだの　なかみは　くうどうにnなっていて　のぞきこんだ　あいてをnすいこんでしまうと　いわれている。
몸 안은 빈 공간으로n이루어져 있어서 들여다본 상대를n빨아들여 버린다고 전해진다.
Son corps est creux. On raconte que celui qui regardenà l’intérieur finira aspiré par le néant.
Sein Körper ist hohl. Man sagt, dass diejenigen,ndie in den Körper blicken, hineingezogen werden.
Su cuerpo está hueco. Se dice que quien mire dentro,nserá tragado por un agujero negro.
Il suo corpo è vuoto. Pare che chiunque si avvicininper guardare dentro venga risucchiato.
Its body is hollow. It is said that those who lookninto its body are sucked into the void.
体の　中身は　空洞に　なっていてnのぞきこんだ　相手をn吸いこんでしまうと　言われている。
からだの　なかみは　くうどうで　なにも　ない。nブラックホールの　ように　なんでも　すいこみnすいこまれると　もどって　これないと　いわれる。
몸 안에는 텅 비어서 아무것도 없다.n블랙홀처럼 무엇이든 빨아들이며n빨려 들어가면 되돌아 올 수 없다고 전해진다.

Le corps de Téraclope est totalement creux. Il n’y a rienndu tout à l’intérieur. On raconte que son corps est commenun trou noir. Ce Pokémon peut absorber n’importe quoi,nmais rien n’en ressort jamais.
Zwirrklops Körper ist komplett hohl. Es wird auch mit einemnSchwarzen Loch verglichen. Dieses Pokémon nimmt allesnin seinem Körper auf, es kommt jedoch nichts wieder heraus.

Dusclops está completamente hueco por dentro. Dicen que suncuerpo es como un agujero negro. Este Pokémon es capaz denabsorber cualquier cosa, pero cosa que absorba, cosa que nondejará salir nunca más.

Il corpo di Dusclops è completamente vuoto. Non contienenassolutamente nulla. Infatti si dice che sia una sorta dinbuco nero. Il Pokémon assorbe ogni cosa all’interno delnproprio corpo, ma non rilascia mai nulla.

Dusclops’s body is completely hollow—there is nothing at allninside. It is said that its body is like a black hole. ThisnPokémon will absorb anything into its body, but nothing willnever come back out.
体の　中身は　空洞で　なにも　ない。nブラックホールの　ように　なんでも　吸い込みn吸い込まれると　戻って　これないと　いわれる。
どんな　おおきさの　ものも　すいこんで　しまう。nあやしげな　ての　うごきと　ひとつめの　ちからでnあいてを　さいみん　じょうたいにして　あやつる。
아무리 큰 것도 빨아들인다.n괴상한 손의 움직임과 외눈의 힘으로n상대를 최면 상태로 만들어 조종한다.

Téraclope peut absorber des objets de toute taille.nCe Pokémon hypnotise son ennemi en faisant des gestesnmacabres et en attirant l’attention sur son unique œil.nL’ennemi hypnotisé obéit ensuite aux ordres de Téraclope.

Zwirrklop absorbiert alles, egal, wie groß es auch sein mag.nDieses Pokémon hypnotisiert seinen Gegner, indem es aufnmakabre Weise winkt und sein einziges Auge zeigt.nDer hypnotisierte Gegner führt dann seine Befehle aus.

Dusclops absorbe todo lo que pilla, al margen del tamaño quentenga. Este Pokémon hipnotiza a su rival moviendo las manosnde forma macabra y usando el ojo de manera implacable.nUna vez hipnotizado, el enemigo obedecerá.

Dusclops assorbe qualsiasi cosa indipendentemente dalle suendimensioni. Questo Pokémon ipnotizza il nemico con unnmacabro movimento delle mani e con il suo unico occhio,ncostringendolo a eseguire i suoi ordini.

Dusclops absorbs anything, however large the object may be.nThis Pokémon hypnotizes its foe by waving its hands in anmacabre manner and by bringing its single eye to bear.nThe hypnotized foe is made to do Dusclops’s bidding.
どんな　大きさの　ものも　吸いこんで　しまう。n怪しげな　手の　動きと　一つ目の　力でn相手を　催眠　状態にして　操る。
からだの　なかは　からっぽ。nくちを　あけると　ブラックホールのnように　なんでも　すいこんでしまう。
몸속은 텅 비어 있다.n입을 열면 블랙홀처럼n무엇이든 빨아들인다.
身體內部是空的。n只要一張開嘴就會像n黑洞一樣吸入所有東西。
Son corps est complètement creux. Quand il ouvrenla bouche, il aspire tout ce qui passe près de lui,nà la façon d’un trou noir.
Sein Körper ist vollkommen hohl. Wenn es seinnMaul öffnet, saugt es wie ein schwarzes Lochnalles in sich auf.
Está completamente hueco. Cuando abre lanboca, es capaz de absorber cualquier cosa,ncomo si fuera un agujero negro.
L’interno del suo corpo è completamente vuoto.nApre la bocca per risucchiare qualsiasi cosa,ncome un buco nero.
Its body is entirely hollow. When it opens itsnmouth, it sucks everything in as if it were anblack hole.
体の　中は　空っぽ。n口を　開けると　ブラックホールのnように　なんでも　吸いこんでしまう。
身体内部是空的。n只要一张开嘴就会像n黑洞一样吸入所有东西
さまよっている　ひとだまを　みつけnからっぽの　たいないに　すいこむ。nすいこまれて　どうなるかは　なぞ。
떠도는 사람의 영혼을 찾아n텅 빈 체내로 빨아들인다.n그 후 영혼이 어떻게 되는지는 알 수 없다.
尋找遊盪的靈魂，吸入自己n空洞的身體裡。沒人知道n被吸入後會發生什麼事。
Il cherche des feux follets pour les avaler.nCe qu’il se passe alors à l’intérieur de son corpsnvide est un mystère.
Es sucht umherirrende Seelen und saugt sie innseinen leeren Körper. Was dann mit ihnennpassiert, ist ein Rätsel.
Busca fuegos fatuos y los absorbe en su cuerponhueco. Lo que pasa dentro luego es un misterio.
Va in cerca di fuochi fatui e li risucchia nelnsuo corpo vuoto. Cosa succeda all’internonè un mistero.
It seeks drifting will-o’-the-wisps and sucks themninto its empty body. What happens inside isna mystery.
さまよっている　人魂を　見つけn空っぽの　体内に　吸いこむ。n吸いこまれて　どうなるかは　謎。
寻找游走的灵魂，吸入自己n空洞的身体里。没人知道n被吸入后会发生什么事。
